channel.title: Encryption && Decryption
channel.description: Hello everyone, I have an encryption and decryption method that encrypts a file using AES in c#, I can only decrypt an encrypted file by writing out the file output I want it to decrypt to. Ex Decrypt(file_encrypted.txt, file_decrypted.txt, password). I want a case whereby I can decrypt the file to it's original extension without writing the output extension myself. Sorry for my bad English, Thank you in advance

item.title: Encryption && Decryption
item.dc:creator: system
item.description:
This topic was automatically closed 3 days after the last reply. New replies are no longer allowed.

Read full topic
